column4: I'm reading Java at University. I'm reading my first course so it was just learned how to compile in Windows. I have dualboot and I prefer to work in Ubuntu... But how do I compile Java in the terminal? Please give me the correct channel if I'm wrong. Thanks.
I don't know how to compile either if I've installed JavaFX correct. May I change Channel or not?
install the jdk and do the same you do in windows
